SETS.query: Set of 3 product types (Product_I, Product_II, Product_III), 2 processing stages (Stage_A, Stage_B), and 4 equipment types (Equipment_A1, Equipment_A2, Equipment_B1, Equipment_B2)
SETS.LaTeX: Product = \{Product_I, Product_II, Product_III\}, Stage = \{Stage_A, Stage_B\}, Equipment = \{Equipment_A1, Equipment_A2, Equipment_B1, Equipment_B2\}

VARIABLES.name: x_product_stage_equipment
VARIABLES.LaTeX: x_{p,s,e} \in \{0, 1\},  orall p \in Product, s \in Stage, e \in Equipment
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable indicating whether product p is processed on equipment e during stage s

PARAMETERS.name: raw_material_cost_I
PARAMETERS.description: Raw material cost for Product I (Yuan/Piece)

PARAMETERS.name: raw_material_cost_II
PARAMETERS.description: Raw material cost for Product II (Yuan/Piece)

PARAMETERS.name: raw_material_cost_III
PARAMETERS.description: Raw material cost for Product III (Yuan/Piece)

PARAMETERS.name: processing_time_I_A1
PARAMETERS.description: Processing time for Product I on Equipment A1 during Stage A (pieces)

PARAMETERS.name: processing_time_I_A2
PARAMETERS.description: Processing time for Product I on Equipment A2 during Stage A (pieces)

PARAMETERS.name: processing_time_I_B1
PARAMETERS.description: Processing time for Product I on Equipment B1 during Stage B (pieces)

PARAMETERS.name: processing_time_I_B2
PARAMETERS.description: Processing time for Product I on Equipment B2 during Stage B (pieces)

PARAMETERS.name: processing_time_II_A1
PARAMETERS.description: Processing time for Product II on Equipment A1 during Stage A (pieces)

PARAMETERS.name: processing_time_II_A2
PARAMETERS.description: Processing time for Product II on Equipment A2 during Stage A (pieces)

PARAMETERS.name: processing_time_II_B1
PARAMETERS.description: Processing time for Product II on Equipment B1 during Stage B (pieces)

PARAMETERS.name: processing_time_II_B2
PARAMETERS.description: Processing time for Product II on Equipment B2 during Stage B (pieces)
